name: Solar System Simulation (Akoni3)
description:
My Solar System Project. I added the following elements:

  1. Sun - Rotation on axis, Fire Sound
  2. Mercury - Rotation on axis, Rotation around sun, Planetary Sound
  3. Venus - Rotation on axis, Rotation around sun, Planetary Sound
  4. Earth - Rotation on axis, Rotation around sun, Planetary Sound
  5. Mars - Rotation on axis, Rotation around sun, Planetary Sound
  6. Comets - Spawns, Rotation around Sun Comet Sound

Credits

Created By Mario Edwards
